titleStmt.title: A Transcription of John in Codex Sinaiticus
GA 01
The New Testament
The Gospel according to John
john

respStmt.name: the International Greek New Testament Project

titleStmt.funder: The Arts and Humanities Research Council

sponsor.name: The Institute for Textual Scholarship and Electronic Editing

publisher.name: The Institute for Textual Scholarship and Electronic Editing
University of Birmingham

availability.p: Available for noncommercial re-use provided attribution is made to the original creators and the subsequent derivative is licensed as ShareAlike (Creative Commons by-nc-sa)

projectDesc.p: This transcription was made by the International Greek New Testament Project in its work towards the Editio Critica Maior of John between 2000 and 2010.

editorialDecl.p: The initial transcription file was a plain text file for use with COLLATE, later converted to XML. Further information about the transcription procedures followed may be found in the electronic edition of the majuscules at http://www.iohannes.com/majuscule/
The XML specifications may be found at http://epapers.bham.ac.uk/738/

revisionDesc.change: Missing closing tag supplied in 19:20 by HH
S1 corrections added in 19:20-21 and 21:25 by HH
Hyphen entity replaced by lb attribute break="no" by HH
xmlid of pb elements corrected by HH
Conversion and initial proofreading finished by HH
